description:
This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between BESTIA Academy and Gaimin Gladiators in the Circuit X Betboom Redemption Curitiba Group D, scheduled for January 22 at 5:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "BESTIA Academy" if BESTIA Academy win the match against Gaimin Gladiators.

This market will resolve to "Gaimin Gladiators" if Gaimin Gladiators win the match against BESTIA Academy.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://www.sofascore.com/esports.

This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between BESTIA Academy and Gaimin Gladiators in the Circuit X Betboom Redemption Curitiba Group D, scheduled for January 22 at 5:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Over" if BESTIA Academy and Gaimin Gladiators play 3 or more games in this series.

If fewer than 3 games are played, this market will resolve to "Under".
